00022 BOOL SelectCameraDialog::OnInitDialog() {
00023         CArray<CLSID> ids;
00024 //      m_combo.Create(WS_CHILD|WS_VISIBLE|WS_VSCROLL|CBS_DROPDOWNLIST, CRect(10,10,200,100), this, IDC_COMBOCAMERANAME);
00025         enumFilters(CLSID_VideoInputDeviceCategory, m_names, ids);
00026         CComboBox* combo = (CComboBox*)GetDlgItem(IDC_COMBOCAMERANAME);
00027         for (int i=0; i<m_names.GetCount();i++)
00028                 combo->AddString(m_names[i]);
00029         return true;
00030 }
